TopicTitle: The Dunatian, Playable Save File (Like a Scenario)

Articles.Content:
Ah hah Rick Kerman is a pilot! 5 more to go.

Rick Kerman - Pilot

Mark Kermney - Engineer

Christopher Beck - Scientist

Beth Johanssen - Engineer

Alex Vogman - Scientist

Commander Lewis - Scientist

Roster complete

Goddammit! I am sure this is screwed up since the shuttle was cancelled before he even started the book.

> 
> *Crew readies for transport via traditional shuttle launch torendezvous with the main vessel harbored in low orbit.*

Co-ordinates

Ares 3 Base -15.43128 -34.92461 (nice flat spot near centre of crater)

Pathfinder -30.29469 -28.70355 (in a depression just beyond anomaly A)

This is Kerbal Space Program, we can do everything NASA can't even dream of. Go ahead.
Woohoo! Ares V done, posting tonight, it's awesome!

OK another peice added to the puzzle, it wasn't necessary for gameplay, just for completeness sake. In the book they delivered 14 of the cargo modules to Mars, it's gonna make a hell of a mess in that crater.
I have a stock shuttle if you need one for the missions lol.

Another piece done, when the Antennae might actually be useful in the next version, will probably need a docking port and decoupler to add it to the rover.

Texture Replacer I assume.

Also that looks cool man, pretty low part count I assume?

> 
> Texture Replacer I assume.
> Also that looks cool man, pretty low part count I assume?

Yeah some mod I downloaded, justwanted shiny visors.

Pretty low, I mean compared with trying to duplicate the real thing.

> 
> Yeah some mod I downloaded, justwanted shiny visors.
> Pretty low, I mean compared with trying to duplicate the real thing.

Yay, me too! Can you have shiny visors and nothing else?

> 
> Yay, me too! Can you have shiny visors and nothing else?

I think it's possible but I don't know how to get it, so far all the packs I have tried, changed the suits but not the visors.

> 
> Yay, me too! Can you have shiny visors and nothing else?

If you install Texture Replacer but don't have any textures to replace, then it'll keep everything as-is--except for the visors.

You can also adjust the visors so they can have "real-time" reflections (actually about 1 second lag there) or static reflections.

> 
> If you install Texture Replacer but don't have any textures to replace, then it'll keep everything as-is--except for the visors.
> You can also adjust the visors so they can have "real-time" reflections (actually about 1 second lag there) or static reflections.

I will give that a go, thanks man

- - - Updated - - -

So I am looking at making a Trailer for the release, coming soon^tm^ , which is really time consuming, and I have to learn a lot of new skills, so if anyone is interested in helping me make it feel free to chime in. This 10 seconds is what I have so far.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D4nQyS2YeVE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D4nQyS2YeVE)

Exciting news! Even though it is still Beta and only posted a week ago, this project has risen to the 3rd page of most monthly downloads for all shareables on Curse, just about to pass Clivman's constellation pack, sorry mate.

I wanted to tell you too, check the Hermes alpha download for my docking port connector. I think it will make your Hermes a lot more rigid.
DL-ing it now, nothing will beat my shuttle for the top though! hehehehe

Just picked myself up an RTG in stock....hehehe <-evil chuckle

![EysImXK.png](http://i.imgur.com/EysImXK.png)

Seriously there has to be more ways to stuff up than, I rolled the rover, or I went the wrong direction. Add I forgot to pick up the RTG, which won't stop you driving, but it will make it take longer.

More compact version, on the rear

![yiOIijL.png](http://i.imgur.com/yiOIijL.png)
Made some improvements to thw rover. Some structural intake bumpers have made it virtually indestructible on Kerbin, you get more air on Duna so we will see when I do the next leg.

![uCOeBAr.png](http://i.imgur.com/uCOeBAr.png)

![QTQe1T3.png](http://i.imgur.com/QTQe1T3.png)

I have purposefully put the solar panels low down to make it difficult and dangerous to drive with them open.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-25T23:49:14Z" title="09/25/2015 11:49  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 25, 2015</time> by selfish\_meme**

Wasn't happy with pathfinder, a bit of a rework.

![AbwIKgH.png](http://i.imgur.com/AbwIKgH.png)
Wow... i guess i never really looked at this before! its very cool, would love to help, what is still needed?

> 
> Wow... i guess i never really looked at this before! its very cool, would love to help, what is still needed?

Hi Bubba, everything. I have all the craft built, the co-ordinates for everything, a route mapped out and an estimated completion time. But it all needs testing and polishing. The worst things are the Duna Ascent Vehicle and the Duna Descent vehicle. The best things are the Kerbin Launch Vehicles, the Rover, the base and the Hermes. I need to finish the trailer and a 'How to play/Plot' document.

Really if you want to help, pick something that interests you, download what is there, read through the forum (and the book if you have it) test it, and make it better.

Cheers, SM.
